title: Whale Oil Lamp, early 19th century
description: One of a pair of whale oil lamps. Flat semicircular container with brass cup over the filling hole; attached to a triangular piece of tin, arched below and with hole at top; at the front of the container a pipe connecting with upright cylinder which is fitted with two brass tubes and a brass plate. -a and -b are the same.

tombstone.epitaph: Whale Oil Lamp, early 19th century.Tin, brass. 1941-98-73-a.
